urls.title: WWT responds to Environment Agency‚Äôs warning that reaching net zero ‚Äònot enough to save our planet‚Äô
urls.description: Environment Agency Chief Executive Sir James Bevan warned government and business on Tuesday (16 March) that we need climate adaptation measures as well as net zero ambitions, describing them as ‚Äútwo sides of the same coin‚Äù.

tweets.text:
The @EnvAgency says: üì¢ #NetZero is not enough to save the planet; climate adaption measures are vital too.

We say: üì¢ Wetlands are the answer!

Our #BlueRecovery plan to create and restore 100k hectares of wetlands will help the UK adapt and thrive > https://t.co/VtC4Cmgvvh https://t.co/4GgVoODeu0
#TeamEA are supporting the response to a fire at a derelict mill in #Oswaldtwistle Please follow @LancashireFRS advice if you‚Äôre in the area ‚¨áÔ∏è https://t.co/PV1ErmJciX

Great question (albeit I suspect rhetorical) from @altogetherfool @ tonight‚Äôs mtg. @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA so, are you ‚ÄúChoosing how you regulate or is it that you do not have the ability to regulate?‚Äù #timeforaninquiry @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @DaveJonesNuL
@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Absolutely pathetic ...

@EnvAgencyMids @scottdegg @RedIndustries2 You‚Äôre a feeble, spineless organisation that‚Äôs not fit for purpose.  An independent public enquiry into your failings should result in prosecutions for criminal negligence.

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 This means nothing to the residents of Newcastle under Lyme and stoke on Trent. That landfill isn‚Äôt a landfill  anymore, it‚Äôs a 4/5 storey pile of crap and growing !!! It just needs shutting down and covering up.
@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Nowhere near good enough. You've ignored the issue for too long and that is why @RedIndustries2 have behaved as they have. Close it and prosecute them.

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 No you don't "work to create better places for people", you do nothing while @RedIndustries2 work to create an awful place for people..
üò†üò†üò†üò† https://t.co/ijvxiD2IlY

@markeltro @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA I will be ringing 0800 807060 to report being poisoned in my own home & ask to be evacuated which they decline, just like I did 3am Xmas morning. They need to know our suffering at the time not in a sanitised email they can read a week later, I want officers out to investigate.
